item_description: Tool to detect rapid eye movements during REM.

steps.name: REMs detector
steps.description: Documentation for the REMs detector based on the shot-grouping approach.

steps.name: Input Files
steps.description:
Start by adding your PSG files.

Select the 2 EOG channels.

The EOG channels are used to detect REMs.

list.name: Bandpass filter before the baseline computation
list.description: Define your settings for the bandpass filter.

list.name: Peaks Finder Settings
list.description: Define your settings for the peaks detection.

list.name: Peaks Matches Settings
list.description: Define your settings for the peaks matches.

list.name: Intersections Settings
list.description: Define your settings for the intersections finder.

list.name: MORs Settings for matched peaks
list.description: Define your settings for the creation of MORs from peaks matched.

list.name: MORs Settings for unmatched peaks
list.description: Define your settings for the creation of MORs from peaks unmatched.

alias.tooltip: List of aliases separated by a semicolon(;) character

file_selection_only.tooltip: Set it to 1 if you only need to select a file and not its montages and channels.
